DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the effects of spinal mobilizations on symptoms, 3D movement of the neck, neck muscle electromyography and sympathetic nervous system activity in people with neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Spinal Mobilizations on Symptoms, Neck 3D Movement, Neck Muscle Electromyography and Sympathetic Nervous System Activity in People With Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Intermittent neck pain That worsens or improves with certain neck movements or positions Has not been caused by a blow, fall or accident Cervicobrachialgia Has been treated with or is awaiting neck surgery Diagnosed with a particular inflammatory disease or spinal condition Where treatment with cervical mobilizations is contraindicated
